about_blog_1: Eğer blog yazısı yazmak istiyorsanız, blogumuzun yazacağınız yazılara açık olduğunu unutmayın. Eğer kendi blogunuz varsa ve blogunuzda Phalcon ile ilgili yazılar yazıyorsanız daha fazla okuyucuya ulaşmanız için bu yazılarınızı sosyal medya hesaplarımızda yayınlayabiliriz. Eğer blog yazınız İngilizce değilse bunu mümkünse İngilizceye çevirmeye çalışabiliriz. PHP ile ilgili, Phalcon kitlesine ulaştırmak istediğiniz yazıları da bize iletin.
about_description_1: Amazing projects need amazing hands. We might not know you just yet, but we think you'd be a great fit for building a better web. Together, we're ready to change the world! Here at Phalcon, we’re building a new generation framework for PHP; we want to give you an amazing performance while helping you develop in an easy and fun way.
about_description_2: Phalcon'u en az bizim kadar seveceğinizi umuyoruz. Her türlü yardım ve işbirliğine açığız. Palcon'a katkıda bulunmak için C dilini bilmek zorunda da değilsiniz! Katkıda bulunabileceğiniz başka birçok alan var :
about_documentation_1:
The repository of this website is available on github. We are using that repository as a source for our documentation for the English language only!.

We always appreciate corrections, additions and enhancements in our documentation, so all you have to do is clone the repository and issue a pull request!

If you can help non English speaking developers by translating some of the content to another language, that would be great! We are using :3: for our translations, and you can find our project here
about_evangelism_1: There are a lot of people who still don't know that Phalcon exists or that it really works. We are certain that many developers will benefit from hearing what Phalcon is all about and how it can help them. If you know of any PHP events/meetings and you wish to give a talk about the project, you have our full support. Who wouldn't want to know about the tool that is revolutionizing PHP development?
about_sample_apps_1: Big examples help others to better understand how big things can be created with Phalcon. Feel free to share repositories to sample applications helping others with their work and allow others to give you feedback about your work too!
about_screencasts_1: Biz eğitim videolarını çok seviyoruz. Eğer zamanınız varsa ve topluluğu Phalcon çatısının herhangi bir özelliği ile ilgili video çekerek desteklemek istiyorsanız, bunu seve seve kabul ederiz. Rehber olması açısından Vimeo Kanalımıza bir göz atmanızı tavsiye ediyoruz.
about_share_experiences_1: Don’t be shy, feel free to share the ways through which Phalcon was useful to you with the community. If Phalcon is a success case for you, let us share that with the community. Also, discuss what components needed extra work, what you could do easier, what benefits you got by using Phalcon. Although not everything can be implemented immediately, your input on new feature requests can greatly help us shape the future of the project. Your feedback helps us all.
about_social_networks_1: Phalcon is evolving on a daily basis, through our desire to make it better. Social networks are part of our lives now, and we all interact with others through them. Sharing your Phalcon experience with your social circles will greatly increase the visibility of the project. More and more people will engage in our community, thus making it more powerful, even more feature rich and popular. Like, '+1', share posts that we constantly post on every social network, engage in discussions regarding those posts. People who discover Phalcon through your interactions will thank you!
about_social_networks_2: En popüler sosyal ağlarda bizi bulabilirsiniz. Bizi takip ederek proje bilinirliğinin artmasında yardımcı olabilirsiniz:
about_sponsoring_1: We’re a tiny but effective core team of developers working our tails off. We try to spend as much time as possible on the project. All our passion for this project makes us want to be better every day. Phalcon is open-sourced software and volunteer efforts are needed for its constant evolution. You can help us keep the development active by donating to the project or sponsoring the development. More time and resources dedicated to the project means more activity, more improvement, better support, more amazing features, etc.
about_tests_1: Hiç bir yazılım hatasız değildir. Eğer Phalcon'da bir hata bulursanız bize bildirmekten çekinmeyin. Hataları önceden yakalamak için 16,000den fazla test içeren bir test sistemimiz var. Bununla birlikte birim testleri hiç bir zaman yeterli olmuyor. Test sistemimizi daha da geliştirmek için kendi testlerinizi bize yollayabilirsiniz. Her eklenen test Phalcon'u daha kararlı ve hatasız hale getirecektir.
about_thank_you_1: We would like to thank all of our contributors and members of the community for pushing us to make Phalcon the best framework of its kind. Your kind words and engagement is what drives us to do better. We hope to meet and exceed the trust you put in Phalcon.
about_translations_1: We are trying to reach as many developers as possible, breaking down the language barriers. We are using :2:, to handle all the words or sentences that need to be translated for this site. The project repository is located here.
acl_1: Erişim kontrol listesi (EKT) şu şekilde oluşturulur:
acl_3: The default action is DENY access
acl_4: Register two roles, Users is registered users
acl_5: and guests are users without a defined identity
acl_description: Access Control List allows users to access the modules they're authorized to
auto_loader_1: Register namespaces, prefixes, directories or classes. Take advantage of the autoloader events and maintain full control over what files are loaded and from where.
autoloader_description: Provides the autoloading mechanism of PHP classes following PSR-4.
cache_1: The cache component allows faster access to frequently used or already processed data. It supports many backends such as Redis, Memcached, Mongo, Files, Apc and more
cache_3: Cache data for one day by default
cache_description: Improve your performance with many of the backend caches that Phalcon provides
consulting_header: We have partnered with LEZGRO, a company that specializes in web and mobile application development and is very adept in delivering Phalcon powered applications to their clientele.
consulting_lezgro_1: LEZGRO congratulates you with the your choice of making Phalcon central in your technology stack!
consulting_lezgro_2: Since our company first saw the light of the day in 2003, we have tried various technologies and approaches in software development.
consulting_lezgro_3: Product managers, CTOs, and non-technical founders involve LEZGRO to build products that stand out, quickly and with a high quality.
consulting_lezgro_4: Now that we have acquired positive experience with Phalcon, we are open to advise you on making the decision to develop on Phalcon, and help you bring your Phalcon-based product to market.
consulting_lezgro_5: Örnek çalışmalar ve müşteri görüşlerini görebilir ve sitemiz üzerinden LEZGRO ile iletişime geçebilirsiniz.
consulting_mctekk_1: MCTekK jumped on the Phalcon wagon since day one. From its conception we saw the great advantages that Phalcon was offering and could offer in the future.
consulting_mctekk_2: We have ample experience with Phalcon and have developed a myriad of project with it as the core. We are here to advise you on anything you need concerning Phalcon to help you improve your readiness, quickness and quality.
consulting_mctekk_3: Örnek çalışmalar ve müşteri görüşlerini görebilir ve sitemiz üzerinden bizimle iletişime geçebilirsiniz.
consulting_mctekk_header: MCTekK has already delivered various high end Phalcon projects, with their main strengths being web and mobile development.
contributors_description: Phalcon is improved everyday by our amazing community
crypt_description: Şifrele/Aç : Önemli verilerinizi istenmeyen kişilerin erişiminden koruyabilirsiniz.
dependency_injection_1: Phalcon is built upon a powerful yet easy to understand and use pattern called Dependency Injection. Initialize or define services once - and use them virtually anywhere throughout the application.
dependency_injection_description: Dependency Injection and Location of services and it's itself a container for them.
download_arch_1: ArchLinux için PKGBUILD dosyasına buradan ulaşabilirsiniz
download_compilation_1: Eklentiyi Linux üzerinde kaynak kodundan kolayca derleyip yükleyebilirsiniz.
download_compilation_11: 1. C kaynağından eklenti oluşturmak için bu adımları izleyin:
download_compilation_13: 3. Son olarak, web sunucusunu yeniden başlatın
download_cpanel_1: After requests from the community, the cPanel developers released a custom module that allows for installation of Phalcon in cPanel hosted sites. Information can be found here. The module is maintained in Github.
download_dependencies_1: Phalcon diğer binary eklentilerle doğrudan ilişkili olmamasına rağmen, onlardan bazılarını fonksiyonellik sağlamak için kullanmıştır. Kullanılan eklentiler:
download_dependencies_2: It is not necessary for all the above extensions to be present in the system that has Phalcon installed. You can only install the ones that meet your needs. For instance if you use a MySQL database, then you can only load PDO and PDO/MySQL ignoring the Oracle, SQlite, Postgresql and Mongo.
download_devtools_1: Bu araçlar, iskelet kodun oluşturulması için kullanılan yararlı scriptlerin bir araya getirilmesi ile oluşturulmuştur. Uygulamanın çekirdek bileşenleri basit bir komutla yaratılabilir ve size Phalcon ile rahatlıkla uygulama geliştirme imkânı sunar.
download_devtools_composer_1: Composer'ı ortak bir konuma ya da proje dizinine kurun:
download_devtools_composer_2: composer.json dosyasını aşağıda belirtildiği şekilde oluşturun:
download_devtools_composer_4: Create a symbolic link to the phalcon.php script:
download_devtools_download: Github üzerinden, geliştirici araçlarını da içeren çapraz platform paketini indirebilir ya da klonlayabilirsiniz.
download_docker_1: Phalcon'u Docker ile kullanmanız için bir çok yöntem mevcut.
download_docker_2: Resmi imajlarımız burada. Her zaman düzenleme isteklerinize ve geliştirmelerinize açık olduğumuzu bilmenizi isteriz. Docker dosyaları için repomuz burada :
download_docker_3: Phalcon-compose, Phalcon'u kullanmak için, Docker ile başka bir şey kurmanıza gerek olmadan, izole bir geliştirme ortamı oluşturmanızı sağlar. Phalcon Compose kullanmak için şunlara ihtiyacınız olacak;
download_docker_6: Phalcon Compose varsayılan olarak şu hizmetleri sağlar :
download_docker_7: Phalcon Compose'un kullanımı çok kolaydır. Varsayalım ki şurada yeni bir uygulama oluşturacaksınız :
download_docker_8: Şimdi, konteyner uygulamanızın oluşturulabilmesi için aşağıdaki komutu çalıştırmamız gerekiyor :
download_docker_9: Yukarıdaki komut docker geliştirme ortamınızın iskeletini indirecek.
download_docker_11: Şu adla yeni bir dosya oluşturmanız gerekiyor
download_docker_13: Şu adla yeni bir örnek dosya oluşturuldu
download_docker_14: İhtiyaçlarınıza uygun şekilde bu dosyadaki değişkenleri ayarlayın. En önemli değişken
download_docker_15: Change the name to something you will be able to use. In our case we just leave the default called
download_docker_16: hosts dosyanızı açıp (/etc/hosts) aşağıdaki gibi bir satır ekleyiniz :
download_docker_17: You might want to edit the docker-compose.yml file and remove services that you will not be using. Phalcon Compose offers a lot of services as mentioned above, so your application might not need some of them. Removing the relevant services from the docker-compose.yml file will reduce memory usage of your environment.
download_docker_20: Konteynerler gerektiği gibi indirilecek ve geliştirme ortamınız kurulacaktır.
download_docker_23: Tarayıcınızda :1: adresine giderek ve geliştirme ortamınızın kurulduğunu görebilirsiniz. Artık app klasöründe uygulamanızı geliştirebilirsiniz.
download_docker_25: Ortamı kullanmaya artık ihtiyacınız kalmadığında, kapatmak için bu komutu kullanabilirsiniz :
download_examples_1: The following examples are pre-installed on each vagrant box:
download_freebsd_1: A port is available for FreeBSD. You only need these few commands to install it:
download_ide_stubs_1: The video below outlines how to enable IDE stubs for PhpStorm
download_need_help_1: Yardım almak için Destek sayfamıza göz atın. Size yardım etmek için elimizden geleni yapıyoruz.
download_note: Phalcon is a C extension, so you need to download a binary for your platform or compile it from source code.
download_opensuse_1: Bunun için bir paket var ( Mariusz Łączak'a teşekkür ediyoruz )
download_requirements_1: Daha önce yüklenmiş bazı paketler gerekiyor:
download_source_code: Kaynak Kod: github
download_source_code_switch: Kaynak Kodu (lütfen ilişkili dala geçiniz): github
download_ubuntu: To install Phalcon on Ubuntu or Debian you need to follow these steps:
download_ubuntu_1: If you are missing apt-add-repository run the following command:
download_ubuntu_2: If you wish to install the legacy version of Phalcon (1.x) use the following PPA:
download_vagrant_1: Vagrant, hafif, tekrarlanabilir ve taşınabilir geliştirme ortamları oluşturmak ve yapılandırmak için mükemmel bir araçtır.
download_vagrant_2: Use any of the following boxes to test or develop with Phalcon on a pre-configured environment.
download_windows_dlls: Windows için DLL dosyalarını Github release sayfamızdan indirebilirsiniz
download_windows_installation_1: Phalcon'u Windows işletim sistemi üzerinde gereken DLL dosyasını indirerek kullanabilirsiniz. DLL dosyasını php.ini dosyasının sonuna ekleyip web sunucunuzu yeniden başlatmanız yeterli olacaktır. Detaylar.
download_windows_note: We highly recommend you use the latest version of PHP corresponding to our DLLs, so as to take advantage of the full feature set of Phalcon.
encryption_1: Phalcon provides encryption facilities via the Phalcon\Crypt component. This class offers simple object-oriented wrappers to the openssl PHP's encryption library.
encryption_2: This is a secret key (32 bytes).
encryption_3: This is the text that you want to encrypt.
events_description: Extend the most of the framework components by setting 'hook points'. Create your own events and make your application more flexible and powerful
events_management_1: An EventsManager allows us to attach listeners to a particular type of event. The type that interests us now is 'dispatch'. The following code filters all events produced by the Dispatcher:
events_management_3: Listen for events produced in the dispatcher using the Security plugin
events_management_4: Handle exceptions and not-found exceptions using NotFoundPlugin
events_management_5: Assign the events manager to the dispatcher
flash_messages_1: Use the flash notifier to show notifications to a user in a web application:
flash_messages_description: Flash messages are used to notify the user about the state of actions.
forms_builder_1: Each element in the form can be rendered as required by the developer. Internally, Phalcon\Tag is used to produce the correct HTML for each element and you can pass additional HTML attributes as the second parameter of render():
header_slogan: Its innovative architecture makes Phalcon the fastest PHP framework ever built!
header_tagline: A full-stack PHP framework delivered as a C-extension
hosting_amazon_ec2_1: Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud delivers scalable, pay-as-you-go compute capacity in the cloud.
hosting_amazon_ec2_2: Phalcon'u önceden ayarlanmış, şablon tabanlı Amazon Sunucu İmajı (AMI) ile hızlıca kullanmaya başlayabilirsiniz. Ya da kendiniz bir AMI imajı oluşturabilir, kendi uygulamalarınızı, kütüphanelerinizi, verilerinizi ve ayarlarınızı yükleyebilirsiniz. Detaylar
hosting_aspnix_1: ASPnix provides superior Windows web hosting services. Our customers have rated our service as outstanding. We offer economical plans for shared Windows and Linux cPanel web hosting, Virtual private servers and dedicated servers! See more
hosting_aspnix_2: Phalcon is supported on all Windows shared web hosting packages and plans, no configuration or installation required! They offer a variety of PHP versions from 5.2 - 7.0 as well as many additional extensions!
hosting_azure_1: The Windows Azure cloud provides you with highly scalable and manageable Windows hosting for your web apps. Use Phalcon to reduce your instance costs.
hosting_azure_2: Phalcon kurmak için, SitePoint dokümanını adım adım uygulayabilirsiniz.
hosting_description: SSH root ( veya sudo) erişimli sunucu barındırma hizmeti sunan hizmet sağlayıcılarında bulunan herhangi bir makineye Phalcon kurulabilir. Aşağıdakiler bu hizmeti veren saygın şirketlerin listesi:
hosting_digital_ocean_1: Gerçekten Hızlı Bulut Teknolojisi. Geliştiriciler için tasarlandı. SSD diskli bulut sunucunuzu 55 saniyede kurabilirsiniz. Detaylar
hosting_digital_ocean_2: Başlamak için bu öğreticiyi takip edin
hosting_dcthost_1: DCT Host offers multiple affordable and high quality hosting plans.
hosting_dcthost_2: By default, they have Phalcon installed on all their shared hosting packages.
hosting_fortrabbit_1: Fortrabbit offers many hosting plans (there is one for developers and is free - with some limitations) that would satisfy the needs of most of the developers that wish to either try Phalcon or deploy their applications using it.
hosting_fortrabbit_2: En zorlu projeleri bile karşılayabilecek çeşitli eklentiler sağlar.
hosting_fortrabbit_3: Phalcon'un stabil versiyonları önceden yüklendi, yönetici panelinden enkinleştirebilirsiniz.
hosting_install_instructions: Phalconu standart yükleme talimatlarını kullanarak yükleyin.
hosting_kinghost_1: Since 2006, KingHost is one of the largest hosting company sites in Brazil and already has over 300,000 sites hosted with approximately 60,000 customers. Headquartered in Porto Alegre (RS) , with data centers in Brazil , the company offers the hosting service of shared servers, specific plans for custom developers and projects in the area of enterprise solutions , including cloud computing and dedicated servers. It also offers digital marketing solutions such as email marketing and security solutions.
hosting_layershift_1: You bring the code, we'll sort the servers. Next generation, auto-sizing PaaS for PHP
hosting_layershift_2: Başlamak için bu öğreticiyi takip edin
hosting_linode_1: Linux Sanal Sunucularını Linode Bulut ortamında kurabilir ve yönetebilirsiniz. Saniyeler içinde seçtiğiniz Linux dağıtımını istediğiniz kaynaklarla ve istediğiniz lokasyonda kurabilirsiniz. Daha fazla bilgi edinin
hosting_mediasecure_1: High performance Dedicated Servers with protection against threats including Distributed Denial of Service (DDoS) attacks. Our high-capacity DDoS-Protected network can automatically protect your dedicated server from DDoS attacks up to 4.2 Tbps. See more
hosting_rackspace_1: Bulut Sunucuları, Rackspace Bulut Ortamında Linux veya Windows® çalıştıran sanal makinelerdir. Gereksinimlerinize bağlı olarak CPU, bellek ve depolama gibi kaynakları ölçekleyebilir veya yükseltebilirsiniz. Her şeyden önemlisi, gittiğiniz parayı ödeyebilirsiniz. Detaylar
hosting_webfaction_1: WebFaction Hosting for developers. Full shell access to fast servers with all your favorite tools pre-installed and maintained for the user.
hosting_webfaction_2: WebFaction sunucuları üzerinde Phalcon'u kurmak için burada özetlenen talimatları izleyin.
i18n_1: The component Phalcon\Translate aids in creating multilingual applications. Applications using this component, display content in different languages, based on the user's chosen language supported by the application.
i18n_2: Ask browser what is the best language
i18n_3: Check if we have a translation file for that lang
i18n_description: Translate your applications to many languages easily
join_our_community: Come join our vibrant developer community!
join_our_community_description: Community contributions in Extensions, Plugins, Adapters, VM, examples, source code... and more
license_new_bsd: Phalcon, C ile geliştirilmiş ve PHP eklentisi olarak yüklenen bir PHP Çatısıdır. Yeni BSD Licensı ile dağıtılmaktadır.
low_overhead_1: Zephir/C ile geliştirilmiş eklentiler web sunucu yazılımının başlatılması sırasında bir kere yüklenir
low_overhead_2: Classes and functions provided by the extension are ready to use for any application
low_overhead_3: The code is compiled and isn't interpreted because it's already compiled to a specific platform and processor
low_overhead_4: Alt düzey mimarisi ve optimizasyonları sayesinde <strong> Phalcon, MVC tabanlı PHP çatıları içinde en düşük yükle en yüksek performansı</ strong> sağlayan çatıdır.
low_overhead_description: Low memory consumption and CPU compared to traditional frameworks
mvc_1: Build single and multi-module applications with ease and pleasure. Using the file structure, scheme and patterns you already know.
mvc_hmvc_description: Modules, components, models, views and controllers
odm_for_mongo_1: In addition to its ability to map tables in relational databases, Phalcon can map documents to a MongoDB database. The ODM offers a CRUD functionality, events, validations among other services.
orm_1: A powerful ORM is provided by Phalcon allowing you to manipulate database records as classes and objects. MySQL, PostgreSQL and SQLite are supported out of the box.
phalcon_team_2: Phalcon is and has always been an effort of many volunteers:
phql_1: PHQL is a high-level, object-oriented SQL dialect that allows to write queries using a standardized SQL-like language. PHQL is implemented as a parser (written in C) that translates syntax in that of the target RDBMS. To achieve the highest performance possible, Phalcon provides a parser that uses the same technology as SQLite. This technology provides a small in-memory parser with a very low memory footprint that is also thread-safe.
phql_description: The powerful and secure Phalcon Query Language, PHQL
polling_app: A polling app built from scratch in < 15 min
queueing_1: Activities like processing videos, resizing images or sending emails aren't suitable to be executed online or in real time because it may slow the loading time of pages and severely impact the user experience. The best solution here is to implement background jobs. The web application puts jobs into a queue and which will be processed separately.
queueing_3: Insert the job in the queue
queueing_description: Use the built-in queueing system in Phalcon to schedule jobs and reduce the load of your web server
rest_description: In this case, you can use either a micro or full stack application to meet your goal. In addition, a powerful set of HTTP helpers.
restful_services_1: Writing REST servers and applications has never been easier. No boilerplate. Simple services will fit in one file.
router_1: Routing as it supposed to be. Nothing more. Nothing less.
sharding_2: This service returns a MySQL database
sharding_3: This service returns a PostgreSQL database
sharding_description: Connect, store and retrieve data from many database systems at the same time
sponsors_description_1: For those that wish to sponsor our work and further the development of Phalcon, we offer various sponsorship options that will fit any budget. Sponsoring our work allows us to devote more time to the project, offer faster responses to bugs and features and ensure the projects's stability.
sponsors_our_great_sponsors: These are our sponsors! Thank you!!
support_documentation_1: Lütfen herşeyden önce :1: bölümünü kullanın. Ayrıca dokümanlarımızda aradığınızı bulabilmek için arama özelliğini de kullanabilirsiniz. Eğer sorunuza hâla yanıt bulamadıysanız, aşağıda birkaç seçenek daha bulunmaktadır.
support_note: Karşılaştığınız çoğu hatanın ortaya çıkmasının en genel sebebi son sürümün kullanılmamasıdır. Lütfen :1: adresini ziyaret edin ve en son uygun sürümü indirin (ya da derleyin) ve karşılaştığınız meselenin gerçekten bir hata olup olmadığından emin olun.
support_please_note_1: Stack Overflow, kendini Phalcon' u desteklemeye adamamıştır.
support_please_note_2: Lütfen bu bölümden hata bildiriminde bulunmayın. Bunun için GitHub üzerindeki olay takip sistemini kullanabilirsiniz.
support_please_note_3: Lütfen bu bölümden yeni özellik talebinde bulunmayın. Bunun için GitHub üzerindeki olay takip sistemini kullanabilirsiniz.
support_please_note_5: Soru içerisinde 'Phalcon' dan bahsettiğinizden emin olun.
support_reporting_a_bug_1: Yukarıdaki seçeneklerin tamamını deneyip çözüme ulaşamadıysanız lütfen Github'da bulunan olay takip sistemi (issue tracker) bölümünü kullanarak hataları bildirin.
support_slack_1: Bize Slack üzerinde PhalconChats kanalından ulaşabilirsiniz.
support_stack_overflow_1: Eğer Stack Overflow'a yabancı değilseniz veya Stack Overflow'u kullanmayı tercih ediyorsanız, arama yapmak ya da sorgularınızı etiketlemek için phalcon etiketini kullanabilirsiniz.
team_andres_1: Andres is no stranger to open source projects. In the last nine years, he has designed and released frameworks for PHP and has been involved in web development - his main passion.
team_andres_2: A TR35 winner, Andres' main drive is to always choose and implement or use the right tool for the job, mostly focused on performance. Therefore in 2011 a new idea was in the works; to create a new kind of framework for PHP developers, one that focuses on usability, features and mostly performance.
team_andres_3: Through this new innovative approach Phalcon was born. A PHP framework written in C that can offer a wealth of features to developers while maximizing performance and keeping resource utilization low.
team_andres_4: Andres , Phalcon'un ana değiştiricilerinden ve ilham vericilerinden biridir.
team_eduar_1: Eduar, uygulama geliştirme konusunda birkaç yıllık tecrübeye sahip bir C / PHP geliştiricisidir. 2011'de başlayan Phalcon projesinin kurucuları ve kurucularından biridir.
team_eduar_2: He has taken part in all areas, from the framework design to the internal kernel functions, including documentation and developer tools. He is driven by a fascination with frameworks, languages and new technologies.
team_eduar_3: Eduar likes science fiction movies and sometimes plays football.
team_nikolay_1: Nikolay has been developing web applications for over 10 years. He has been involved in high performance as well as complex websites and designs.
team_nikolay_2: Nikolay has been working with Open Source projects for a long time, utilizing them whenever requirements allow. He thus started using his personal time to give back to the community, by forking projects, offering architectural changes and suggestions, as well as performance ones. He has been instrumental in improving Open Source CMS projects receiving positive feedback from the community.
team_nikolay_3: His continuous involvement with open source projects has helped him advance his technical knowledge while abiding by the give back to the community mentality.
team_nikolay_4: Nikolay is an avid supporter of maximizing performance in web applications. After his introduction to Phalcon, he decided to pursue and use the project and become an Evangelist for it. He is leading the effort toward the Russian community and offers resources for Russian speaking developers.
team_nikolay_5: His contributions include: A mirror of the main website in Russian (http://www.phalcon.ru), a mirror of the documentation repository in Russian (http://docs.phalconphp.ru), ongoing changes and corrections to the documentation in English, a group in the social network Vkontakte (https://vk.com/phalconphp).
team_nikos_1: Nikos 20 yıldan daha uzun süredir IT endüstrisinde. Kişisel projelerine ve müşterilerinin projelerine kullanmaya başlayarak 2000 yılında PHP dünyasına katılmıştı.
team_nikos_2: He loves discovering new technologies and ways to integrate them with existing applications and thus reap the benefits they offer.
team_nikos_3: He is an avid supporter of Test Driven Development (TDD) and always tries to get full coverage in his code.
team_nikos_4: Nikos' continuing interest in new and innovative technologies breaking out of the norm introduced him to Phalcon. He joined the core team and his tasks mainly involve coordination of NFRs and bug fixes, help with tests, documentation and the incubator. Nikos is also responsible for maintaining the Windows DLLs for the project and offers support whenever possible.
team_serghei_1: Serghei, 8 yıldan uzun bir süredir Ruby/PHP geliştiricisi olarak çalışmaktadır ve web uygulaması geliştirme konusunda uzmanlaşmıştır. Davranışa Dayalı Geliştirme (BDD) destekçisi ve savunucusudur. Ayrıca Codeception ekibinin üyesidir.
team_serghei_2: Serghei can be found neck deep in innovative technologies which introduced him in Phalcon. He is responsible for the coordination of bug fixes, testing, developer tools, incubator and support other Phalcon-related projects.
team_serghei_3: When he's not working, Serghei enjoys watch documentaries, science fiction movies and sometimes plays Mahjong or Go.
team_volodymyr_1: Volodymyr, 20 yılı aşkın süredir sunucu ve web uygulamaları geliştirmektedir. Çok karmaşık ve yüksek performanslı yazılım uygulamaları tasarlamakta ve yazmaktadır. Volodymyr'in, hızlı, sağlam ve optimize edilmiş yazılım yazma tutkusu onu Phalcon kullanmaya itti ve kendisi geliştirme ekibine katıldı.
team_volodymyr_2: Volodymyr, boş zamanında çok sevdiği eşinin şirketine destek olur, açık kaynak projelerine katkıda bulunur ve yabancı dilleri inceler.
template_engine_volt_1: Volt, PHP için Zephir / C'de yazılmış, ultra hızlı ve tasarımcı dostu bir tema dilidir. Size tema geliştirme sürecinizi hızlandıran ve kolaylaştıran yardımcı uygulamalar sağlar. Volt'u, uygulamanızda tek başına bir bileşen olarak kullanabileceğiniz gibi Phalcon'un diğer bileşenleri ile de kolayca entegre edebilirsiniz.
template_engine_volt_description: A template engine inspired by Jinja but built in C for PHP
template_engines_1: Views represent the user interface of your application. Views are often HTML files with embedded PHP code that perform tasks related solely to the presentation of the data. Views handle the job of providing data to the web browser or other tool that is used to make requests from your application.
template_engines_description: Views represent the user interface of your application
testimonials_1: Selamlar, Phalcon ekibi! Phalcon çatısı ile inşa edilmiş bir projem var. Sitem, gitar sekmeleri ve akor kataloğu içeren bir Guitarama sitesi (: 2: ). Site, Rusça ancak umarız çoğu sayfanın anlaşılması sizin için sorun olmaz. Site, Ocak 2013'ün başında yeni bir platformda yeniden başlatıldı ve o zamandan beri istikrarlı bir büyüme gösterdi. Şu andaki günlük oralama 1500 tekil ziyaretçi, 5000 sayfa görüntüleme yapıyor. Site, eski bir fiziksel sunucuda 1хP4-3Ghz, 4GB RAM'de çalışıyor. Bir kez daha, bu harika çatı ve yaptığınız her şey için teşekkürler :) Michael.
testimonials_2: Merhaba, Phalcon ekibi. Phalcon'u :2: ve :4: projelerinde kullanma konusundaki başarı hikayemizi sizlerle paylaşmak istiyorum. Kazakistan'ın en çok ziyaret edilen ve yüksek trafikli siteleri olan sitelerimiz, BDT'deki ilk 10'a girmiştir. Her iki site de Phalcon\Mvc\Micro üzerinde yazılmış tek RESTful benzeri API üzerinde çalışmaktadır. Yüksek trafik oluşan zamanlarda, saniyede 400 isteğe cevap verebilmektedir ve üzerine çıkabilir. Phalcon'a geçmek, içerik oluşturma süresini ve CPU ve RAM tüketimini azaltmamızı ve aynı zamanda geliştirme sürecini kısaltmamızı sağladı. Yeni projelerimizde Phalcon'u kullanmaya devam edeceğiz. Yaptığınız harika iş için teşekkür ederiz! Saygılarımızla, Nikita Vershinin, Geliştirme Takım Lideri, Kolesa.kz ve krisha.kz
testimonials_3: Phalcon Team, The framework you guys have created is amazing. I've never used a framework that has combined speed, efficiency, brevity, and naturality all in one package. I intend on championing and contributing back to the project in any way that I can. I embarked recently on an ~800 hour project and am happy to say that we are using Phalcon Framework. Bravo. Brian Seymour
testimonials_4: Hi guys, I just ran across Phalcon and it's just awesome! I've merely wanted to say to you how awesome you are! So, thanks for this framework and keep up the good work! Ivan Penchev
testimonials_5: Hi Guys, i wrote simple url-shortener service with phalcon. That was amazing! really. :2:. Demo is here: :4:) Murat Küçükosman
testimonials_6: Hello Phalcon Team, I created a small project designed for Polish users using your framework. I have to admit that the performance is amazing, congratulations good job. Service to validate the content of the web pages in Polish language :2:
testimonials_7: Hi guys! Just wanted to share with you the latest release of our old project - :2: . Switching to phalcon allowed us to halve the server load compared to the previous framework, which is great!
testimonials_description: Below is a collection of testimonials and success stories, from you, the developers and users of Phalcon PHP. We always welcome emails with success stories and will be posting those in our blog. If you wish to send us your success story or get in touch with us, feel free to mail us at :2:.
transactions_1: When a process performs multiple database operations, it might be important that each step is completed successfully so that data integrity can be maintained. Transactions offer the ability to ensure that all database operations have been executed successfully before the data is committed to the database.
transactions_4: Get the robots to be deleted
transactions_5: Something's gone wrong, we should rollback the transaction
transactions_6: Everything's gone fine, let's commit the transaction
transactions_description: Transactions in Phalcon allows to keep the data integrity safe.
